Title: Silverlight HTML Frame
Description: Silverlight HTML Frame is a project containing a Silverlight component to show Html Content in a Silverlight Application HOSTING IN WebBrowser.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Silverlight HTML Frame is a project containing a Silverlight component to show Html Content in a Silverlight Application HOSTING IN WebBrowser.

You can use this Frame to show a web site in binding an Uri or in binding Html Code inside Content property.
It's possible to show a Html Frame into a ChildWindow and many instances inside only one UserControl.
